website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for professional-grade printer paper for important projects, or for photos or crafting, this is a good pick. However, it's pricey and impractical for most everyday printing needs.
pros: Double-sided paper that is suitable for putting together items such as brochures, newsletters, invitations, and more
Can be used to print matte-finish photos
Feels heavy, as it is 9.7 mil thick
Ideal for printing with an inkjet
cons: Expensive, and you only get 50 or 100 sheets per package
Some sheets were bent when taken out of the package
Won't work with all laser printers

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to paper for art prints. The colors are so vibrant, they have an almost water-colory feel to them. The first time I printed on this paper I thought "I didn't know I could draw like this." My picture doesn't do the colors justice - this is truly fantastic paper!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Look at the paper poundage
customer_reviews.text: Look at the details!!! I have purchased this paper for years and loved it. This time instead of buying a 50 page pack, I bought the 100 page pack. Wrong! Its not as good quality. The 50 pack paper is 48 pound and 9.8mil. THe 100 pack is 44 pound and 9mil. I print pictures and the quality of the less poundage is not near as good. I was excited to get a bigger pack. But after printing I couldn't understand the problem until pulling up the paper details and looking at the small print. Very disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dandy

customer_reviews.title: Only prints on one side
customer_reviews.text: I got this paper to print a mini-comic at home, thought it was going to be the same quality on both sides. But it turns out it is different. The front is 100% the best paper to print by far and I will stick to it, but if you want to print on both sides the back will not give you the same effect. ( in my photo the page on the left is the front with 100% quality) That was an extra feature I wanted from this paper, it's not their fault that I wanted a double side printable paper.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great color prints
customer_reviews.text: This paper makes great color prints, on either side or both sides. It may not be the cheapest paper, but it will be difficult to find something in the price range that prints color images as well. I make calendars with color images, and this paper serves my needs very well. I recommend it for anything that requires color printing on either side or on both sides. Good weight as well at 48#. It is similar to Canon MP-101 (45#), which is less expensive, but that paper produces a good color image on just one side.
customer_reviews.author: D W

customer_reviews.title: Epson Premium Presentation Paper
customer_reviews.text: Please note..the paper is great but I was not Happy with the fact the package was previously opened and seems some paper was used missing) because the plastic cellophane was also opened. ..ALSO a huge dent in the corner of the box as well as a tear in the package. I do NOT appreciate sending opened/missing/used items. I usually never have an issue...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for printing art, and my prints come out great. I will say that I wish the back side of the paper (the no print side) could be marked easier. The instructions say to print on the 'white' side. the problem? The other side is just barely off white! :)
customer_reviews.author: scrappygirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Paper EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I had a few sheets of Kodak presentation paper left, so I finished printing my project on the Epson. It was so much brighter with intense color. I did change the setting to Best. Handouts, invites and Project Life cards all look better on Epson Paper! The 100 sheet pack works out to 14¢ a sheet. The weight is heavier than plain paper, but lighter than card stock, so it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Good paper when it's not bent.
customer_reviews.text: I printed on about a dozen pages of this paper and absolutely loved it. Unfortunately, upon further inspection, I realized that several sheets came to me bent in the box and about half of the sheets are bent so bad that they are unusable. Upon close inspection, even the pages that I printed already have a slight bend to them. I really like this paper and will continue to use it, but I will not be able to use half of THIS particular box, because all of the pages are bent to varying degrees. If the paper wasn't bent, I would have given it five stars. I've included photos of the damaged paper.
customer_reviews.author: LarryA

customer_reviews.title: This paper is freakin great - seriously
customer_reviews.text: This paper is freakin great - seriously! I bought some at the store first a long time ago for a school presentation and was really impressed with it, but it was a bit pricey. The price is a lot better here on Amazon, and I ordered it here to make gift bags and signs for my kiddo's birthday party. It's so crisp and clear and vibrant. It's PERFECT for school projects, book reports and the like.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for Art Prints!
customer_reviews.text: The texture and thickness is great for my art prints. I use a "matte photo paper" setting on my printer and the prints look great every time. The thickness is far better than regular printing paper, yet less than cardstock, so my printer doesn't have any problems feeding it through so far. Pleased with purchase and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be 2-sided presentation paper. I printed off 10 brochures. When I folded them I noticed that one side of the paper was white while the other side was off white. It looks pretty unprofessional to me. I'm not sure why this package would be different than the 50 sheets that I normally buy but it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight.  Just as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight paper for presentations. Print quality is good. The reason for the 4 stars: The corners were damaged (maybe dropped in the warehouse) and I was not able to use many of the sheets of paper.
customer_reviews.author: civics teacher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paper for printing
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this paper ! It’s amazing. The prints come out so gorgeous! I will not give 5 stars because the corners came bent and the box was ripped from the corners. Please be careful when packaging because I sell what I print and now the corners are bent! I’m not sure if it got damaged when it was transported by ups. Otherwise, I will buy this paper again.
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: This paper is LIFE!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors printing on this paper for me I did a small photoshop tweak to my image and WOW beautiful prints I'm using the one side 100ct paper on the whitest side and an Epson 1430 with photoshop CC tweaking the layers level and saturation of the image hope this review helps. Blessings to All. I will try to upload a photo.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL colours!
customer_reviews.text: The colour these print are absolutely beautiful. The paper itself isn't as thick as I want it to be, so I'll likely be ordering something else in the future. But the print quality is amazing. For reference I have an Epson Workforce inkjet printer.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: I bought the printer because of the purported water resistant ink process but was very disappointed in the crispness and colors
customer_reviews.text: This paper provides a huge improvement in image quality over standard paper when printing from my Epson WorkForce WF-3640. I bought the printer because of the purported water resistant ink process but was very disappointed in the crispness and colors of the projects I was printing. I figured it was either try another type of paper or box up the printer and take it back. The Premium Presentation Paper has saved the day and I am now happy with both of my purchases! I will say that this paper is a tad heavier/thicker than I really wanted or needed for my project but that is no fault of the product so I am giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paper for Crafting
customer_reviews.text: This papers works very well for making my Chip bags and candy purses and many other customized items that I make for my customers.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Curry

customer_reviews.title: Good for art prints
customer_reviews.text: Nice paper for art prints! Colors came out vibrant and crisp. My only issue might be with the paper thickness - while not copy paper thin, this paper is still pretty flimsy. Not enough to hurt the quality, but for art prints I was hoping for something a bit thicker. However, if you are matting and framing, that won't even matter!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Fife

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value. Shipped right to my door for less than the office store charges before tax. High quality double sided matte photo paper is great for many uses. Thick and durable. Prints look great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Corners damaged in all six boxes. Come on amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All six boxes were damaged on the corners. I was able to use them on our thumbnails as it didn't really matter with them. I maybe able to get enough undamaged pages for the calendars we make or not. Amazon needs to get their people to do better or hire others. This is really unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great for greeting cards!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with my Epson Artisan 730 printer. I used to use Avery greeting card paper but they changed the thickness of their paper and now the Avery paper won’t feed through my printer. I called Epson and they suggested this paper. It’s a matte finish but prints exceptionally well. Just wish it came with a glossy side. If making greeting cards though make sure the package says it is double sided.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Prints one side, amazing, beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this paper! I make buttons and I had a hell of a time looking for paper that will make colors pop. This paper makes my colors POP. Now please keep in mind that this paper doesn't print both sides, just the whitest side. I'm sure there's another set with less paper that does both sides so please read reviews carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Kamy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, but occasionally bent corners
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this paper is superb. I've used various sizes of it for inkjet printing for years, and the results are always outstanding. HOWEVER, about a third of the boxes I've ever received have severely dented corners, with noticeable creases in the corner of every sheet. The packaged product seems to takes a hard impact on a bottom corner at some point in the manufacturing / shipping process. This has happened when ordering several boxes at a time, and also single boxes of the 13x19 size. Not a big deal to most people, but important to me. This is otherwise a Five-Star product all around, and I will continue to use it despite the occasionally bent corners.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time making art prints and I didn't want to spend a ton of money so this product fit my needs. The prints turned out really well too and it was really easy to set up in the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Prints Well and Clean to Handle
customer_reviews.text: Tried this paper with an Epson Workforce printer for Christmas cards. This stock was much easier to use than a similar, house brand paper from a office supply chain. The paper I had used previously printed well but was very dusty and required frequent printer maintenance. I had no such problems with this paper and was very satisfied with the quality of the results. I would purchase it again for cards or presentations.
customer_reviews.author: TomBob

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper
customer_reviews.text: I used this paper to make calendars for our churches 60th anniversary. I wanted the history of the church with pictures on the top sheet and then just a common calendar underneath then bound with a comb binder. The paper worked real well in my inkjet printer. The pictures were good quality and the paper was heavy enough to make good calendars. I would definitely buy again for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Alan King

customer_reviews.title: Good Paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper has a nice weight and feel. It's rigid and absorbent so you get a nice print each time. I think it's a good deal for the price especially.
customer_reviews.author: Tomu-san

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to when I need to do double-sided printing. The colors don't bleed through, and it has good weight. I'm sure I'll be buying more packs in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Solozzo

customer_reviews.title: photo paper bent out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I CAREFULLY slid this paper out of the box/plastic sleeve!!! EVERY page had a bent corner!!! I was printing photos for a state PHOTO CONTEST. No way I can use this paper! No evidence of damage in shipping - this was a production error at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: jbjr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t bleed through
customer_reviews.text: Comparing to printing on regular paper, the difference is extraordinary! I like the quality very much. I use it for experimenting purposes before I print on more expensive paper.
customer_reviews.author: José Cota

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PICTURES
customer_reviews.text: I AM USE TO USING HP PREMIUM MATTE PHOTO PAPER. FOUND THIS AT A MORE AFFORDABLE PRICE. GOOD REVIEWS. SO I GAVE IT A TRY. IT S MY GO TO FROM NOW ON. REALLY NICE EVEN SATURATION. THANKS AMAZON AND EPSON
customer_reviews.author: moon of the dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Great paper.
customer_reviews.text: Using this to print double sided calenders with pictures. Low bleed, picks up and feeds through our Epson printer with no problem. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Epson Matte Photo Paper
customer_reviews.text: THis is a decent matte photo paper. The right side takes good images, the wrong side is a waste of ink. This100 pack is slightly lighter than thve 50 pack, but not by enough to make a big difference. Overall, it' been a good buy. I will buy again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: phillip abbott

customer_reviews.title: Best Paper Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Paper Ever. I've used many types of paper and this is by far prints the brightest, crispiest images on any paper. I'm a landscape designer and give lots of presentations showing full color images of plants & materials. If quality is crucial, this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tristanism

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and produces very sharp images and text
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and produces very sharp images and text. The opacity (text & imagery) is great for a paper that is this thin. It works best if you put your printer on photo settings using matte paper. It works great with vector-based text programs like Microsoft Word or Adobe Illustrator. If you're printing from Photoshop its best to export as a PDF since Photoshop does not render text very well. It also folds very nicely for brochures.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Feller

customer_reviews.title: Go to Paper
customer_reviews.text: My go to paper for crafting. Prints beautifully on the rougher side. This is the one sided presentation paper. I only needed the one side
customer_reviews.author: J Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Basically stock paper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to print matte photos but it was the same as stock paper could of saved money and just used stock paper to print photos if I would have known this was the exact same.
customer_reviews.author: Frank and Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I added three pictures that I have printed on this paper. Seems to do excellent no matter the color. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sanders

customer_reviews.title: suitable for art prints
customer_reviews.text: I make my art prints using this paper. Sturdy, nice texture. No smears. It holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps a defective batch - white on one side and cream on the other
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find anything on the package that indicates this is a one-side print only but in my package, there was a distinct difference in the color of each side on every sheet. Perhaps a defective batch, but cannot be used for two-sided printing. Other than that it appears to be fine paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: May as well have used just cardstock
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed-- felt just like cardstock after printed, very thin cardstock-- could have saved my $20. I think there was a choice for glossy or matte, and I chose matte. Wish I had picked glossy, at least it would have looked like a photograph instead of picture printed on cardstock.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bernardi

customer_reviews.title: Good, reasonably heavy stock
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, excellent for printing holiday cards, etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paper. I used it to print color photos with inkjet printer and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Stiff paper suitable for greeting cards with spectacular color on both sides.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, double-sided matte paper which I use to make birthday cards for family members with lots of photos. I was amazed at the high quality of the color on these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: Ok for value.  Not for good photos
customer_reviews.text: The Hp papers are much sharper than Epson. Paper is very wet after printing. Slight amounts of smug. Paper is not bright but has a tinge to it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A James

customer_reviews.title: Prints Both Sides
customer_reviews.text: This paper is great. Printed photos on both sides without any smearing of leakage. Worked well is a presentation binder
customer_reviews.author: Slickdome

customer_reviews.title: Still the best
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years to print brochures, photos and more. I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: P. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Prints color beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper in printing for my happy planner the prints come out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: carrollstuff

customer_reviews.title: Most Affordable Professional 192 gram Photo Paper!
customer_reviews.text: The best and most affordable 192 gram professional photography paper out there. 100% archival, great color gamut. Never had a client complain once!
customer_reviews.author: honestjuan

customer_reviews.title: Will buy this product the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.text: Never stop making the double sided epson premium paper. Great for card making. Makes great quality prints of my photo's .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Thin paper
customer_reviews.text: The print came out good, but I think that the paper is thin for a professional paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kleitonkss

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this photo paper! Photos Look great! Very happy with this paper!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for two-sided printing.
customer_reviews.text: I write a weekly column about aviation for our local newspaper and then print them off from a MS Word Document and have them in scrapbooks at the airport. These sheets are awesome! I can print on both sides and use just one protective sheet for the scrapbooks.
customer_reviews.author: pasolover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Photo Printing
customer_reviews.text: This is a double-sided photo paper that I actually use for document facsimiles and for some letter printing because the weight is perfect and the pictures look much better than on ordinary paper.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON PURCHASER

customer_reviews.title: Not photo quality
customer_reviews.text: Epson claims this is photo-quality matte paper. It is not. Trying to print with photo matte settings results in poor resolution and over-saturation. I had to switch to plain paper to get decent prints, and all I'm using this paper for are greeting cards that sometimes have photos and DVD cover sheets. I definitely would not use this for printing a quality photo.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Tetrault

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!  Very good, fast service. Item as described, will order again!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Very good, fast service. Item as described, will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Elite1

customer_reviews.title: Favorite paper for photos.
customer_reviews.text: Greatest paper I have ever used for photo printing. The color saturation is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie A. 7

customer_reviews.title: Great paper, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this paper and use it all the time! I only gave it 3 stars because it came packed in just a tyvek envelope. The corners of the paper are all dented up. It’s ok for my use because I have to cut the images down to size anyway, but this should really be packed and shipped with more care.
customer_reviews.author: Lea K

customer_reviews.title: I like it much better than glossy photo paper and both sides are usable.
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing to dislike. It meets my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Help to find right side.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all if you know right printable side. But, it really hard figure out. Any tips? If you print in wrong side it look little white and cheap. 100 sheets
customer_reviews.author: tenzin phuntsok

customer_reviews.title: Nice two sided color inkjet printing
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a two sided color inkjet printing media. The issue is how good is the printer in refeeding the paper for aligned back to back printing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: This paper works really well for me when i want to print nice prints of my art and paintings, and the colors turn out bright
customer_reviews.author: Moondust Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great color and picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paper to make some chip bags for my son’s 7th birthday. I am very pleased with the result. The color and picture came out beautiful. For the price I think it is very worth it. It is quite thick for my purpose or chip bags but it still works. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent print quality
customer_reviews.text: Has a slight red color cast with Canon inks, easy to adjust for.
customer_reviews.author: boB

customer_reviews.title: Unsure how to review...just my personal preference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to print photos for church. It isn’t photo paper or card stock...in-between and my first time using. I’m still not sure if I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the Classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this paper to print posters, labels, and pretty much everything for my classroom! Especially when laminated, this paper is very sturdy and prints well!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper need to ship more carefully
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper all the time for prints Last batch cam in with a ding on every sheet please wrap more carefully
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Go for double sided
customer_reviews.text: Double check for DOUBLE SIDED papers. It will save you a LOT of time figuring out which side is the printing side. My professor had everyone turn up the contrast by 20% to print on our Epson printer, and you'll likely have to as well. Get double sided and never look back.
customer_reviews.author: E G

customer_reviews.title: A great product.  Pictures look like they came out of a photo lab
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that these pictures would look so much like what I used to pay dearly for. The results are excellent, and I have a great new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prints great pictures on my Epson printer
customer_reviews.text: The only two sided matte paper that I was able to find! Prints great pictures on my Epson printer. Don't know how it will do on other printers, but am pretty sure it will be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tool in labeling home-made jams
customer_reviews.text: These fit across 8-oz canning jars to identify jams/relish for sale or gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Epson Premium Presentation Paper Matte
customer_reviews.text: Mailing package in terrible condition on arrival with no padding and broken box. However, individual Presentation pkg were intact. Very nice quality, yet must heavier than I had expected or needed. The positive is that the quality was excellent for not "soaking" up ink while providing great quality photos used. Good purchase, poor packageing delivery.
customer_reviews.author: walker

customer_reviews.title: Great paper for Photos.
customer_reviews.text: Good weight for printing photos for my cards. Shows detail better than glossy and can stamp a sentiment on the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mullenix

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I performed a lot of research to find two-sided photo paper. Finally, we took a chance on this one. Our lack of confidence was due to the somewhat mixed reviews already posted for the product and our requirement for high quality. The paper arrived promptly. The weight of it was just right for our photo album creation and we couldn't be more pleased with the vibrancy of the colors on the page (using a Canon MP800). I'm ordering more before they run out!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper
customer_reviews.text: I am currently working on my architecture portfolio to send out to potential employers and this paper is the only one that I will use. It is amazing how much clearer the prints turn out than that of regular card stock. The colors also turn out more accurate than HP's brochere paper. It is not to stiff either... yet thick enough to score without allowing the blade to penetrate through the paper. Transparency not a issue unless you hold it up to the light.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: Good thickness for prints
customer_reviews.text: Used with an Epson printer and print quality was great
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lancashire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This paper is perfect for wedding stationery! I used it to print my place cards and table number. It’s great quality!
customer_reviews.author: JL8

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous paper!
customer_reviews.text: Great paper! I am using in my HP5660, and it works perfectly! Colors are clear, bright, and stunning! Will be ordering more for sure!! If your on the fence, give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Sanderella

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Just as described Package came kind of bent but still satisfied
customer_reviews.author: mikara

customer_reviews.title: Good for photos & notes too
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper during the course of my research for perhaps an unusual purpose: I print photos on it & then write annotations around the photos. You can't really write on glossy paper, but this paper, being matte, has a nice surface suitable for writing with almost any kind of pen or pencil. It's also quite thick & double-sided. So I can use both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Aydin Orstan

customer_reviews.title: Best among one
customer_reviews.text: I can't compare this to other, similar paper because I don't know of any. It's hard to find 2-sided matte paper. I use if for a yearly calendar, and it's fine, but it would be nice to have other choices, especially made by other printer manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: WordGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper. Especially when you use it with an ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Paper. Especially when you use it with an Epson printer. The prints come out so vibrant and amazing. This paper is pretty thick which is good. It is double sided also. So it is bright white for printing on both sides. I use this paper to print out my Art Cards.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Artist Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great print quality at a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent print quality for a good price. Used to printing the background photos of my poems on that I framed and gave as Christmas gifts. They were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Swingle

customer_reviews.title: I normally love this paper
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this paper. However, the envelope it came in was torn and the product box had been opened, taped closed, reopened and the paper was damaged on two corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid B.

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm an artist and I sometimes print copies of my art to use for cards or examples when I teach. This paper shows the colors magnificently and is extremely cost effective .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hall

customer_reviews.title: Matte Premium Presentation Paper
customer_reviews.text: this paper is exactly what I wanted. It looks fantastic if your have your settings correct. I have an EPSON 1400 and left the paper setting on Plain Bright White instead of choosing the "Premium Presentation Paper" setting and my prints turned out super. I have only printed my art so far from Photoshop after assigning a RGB profile. I tried the "Premium Presentation Paper" setting and my prints came out way darker than I wanted. This may be a different story with photographs? This paper is nice and bright white, the matte finish looks great, and it dries quickly. superb price too. highly recommended high-quality paper.
customer_reviews.author: Errin J. Ironside

customer_reviews.title: Best button paper
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper to print my buttons on and it's the best as far as clarity and quality
customer_reviews.author: Neesha

customer_reviews.title: These are great for epson printers
customer_reviews.text: if you have an Epson printer like the expression premium series 820 or most newer Epson printers these work great. I don't even try non Epson matte on these bottom loading printer. I've tried heavier matte from other manufacturers and they tend to jam. These jam less.
customer_reviews.author: IRON GIGANTIS

customer_reviews.title: Great paper for printing photos!
customer_reviews.text: I love this paper! I'm a professional photographer and this is my favorite affordable paper. It absorbs the ink well, resulting in vivid colors. Because it is matte, the photos don't have any glare, which I like. It's nicely weighted, not too thin, not too thick, just right.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice paper
customer_reviews.text: Nice Paper 40 lbs. I wish I could use it on all my books but it is to expensive for 10 thousand books a year. I wish they sold it in reams. Then I would use this paper all the time. Very nice with no show through. I got it yesterday and I already used it all.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Nyland

customer_reviews.title: Great for photo calendars!
customer_reviews.text: The paper was perfect for my purposes. I used it to make family photo calendars and the weight was sturdy enough for the calendars yet went through my printer without jamming.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul's wife

customer_reviews.title: Great for making posters
customer_reviews.text: Good paper for printing posters that are posted on bulletin boards.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Diemoz

customer_reviews.title: The BEST paper
customer_reviews.text: I'm in grad school working on a graphic design degree, and one of my professors recommended this paper. It is awesome. I haven't used it with a non-Epson printer, but even with my low-end model, it is bright, crisp, and vibrant. Generally, Epson printer + Epson paper = perfection, but this paper in particular is my favorite. And $20 for a 100-pack is a phenomenal price.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: The thick and thin
customer_reviews.text: This paper is 48 lbs, 9.8 mil thick. Staples is 61 lbs, 11 mil thick. You can feel the difference. As far as I'm concerned, they both do a nice job on cards. Staples, however, is a lot less fussy and much easier to load into my old Canon MP560. Appreciate someone pointing out the non-archival fact, something else to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Affordable good quality paper
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paper not the most bright abd thickest “ultra premium” is. But best price per quality
customer_reviews.author: jdea

customer_reviews.title: Epson paper and inks...ya, that's it
customer_reviews.text: Ya, it's Epson. I use nothing but Epson paper and inks in my Artison printer. The quality is perfect.... I use this double-sided matte to create birthday cards for my kids and grandkids that include old pix of them.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Paper adequate
customer_reviews.text: Paper works pretty much as the old double-sided matte. It is not amazing print quality, but I bought it to make greeting cards because you can print on both sides. For that application this paper works very well as people are not anticipating museum quality prints on the cover but they do look quite nice. Much better and more personal than store-bought cards.
customer_reviews.author: Bearboy7623

customer_reviews.title: Best art print paper for the value
customer_reviews.text: Here’s a comparison of print on regular paper multipurpose paper vs the epson matte print, I absolutely love this paper, it’s a game changer when printing art pieces
customer_reviews.author: T N

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic custom printing paper
customer_reviews.text: I needed matte paper to print hi-resolution picture postcards. Glossy premium paper just would not work. This was a good package size and price per sheet. Very fast delivery and great communication!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Super Presentation Paper!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paper. Does a super job with photos front and back. Will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Brassbass

product_meta.title: Epson Premium Presentation Paper MATTE (8.5x11 Inches, Double-sided, 50 Sheets) (S041568),Bright White
product_meta.description:
Size:50 SheetsPerfect for non-glare photographs, craft projects and signage. Resists fading up to 72 years. Guaranteed to work with all inkjet printers. Form Type: N/A; Global Product Type: Office Paper; Paper Type: Presentation; Sheet Size (W x H): 8 1/2 in x 11 in.

AMAZON.COM
This double-sided matte paper from Epson is designed for use with inkjet printers and is ideal for printing sales brochures, greeting cards, newsletter, and photographic portfolios that require both photographic image quality as well as the versatility of two-sided printing with no show-through. The 8.5-by-11-inch sheets have a 93% opacity and an ISO brightness of 103, resulting in bright whites that help make your prints stand out. The 47 lb. basis weight and 9.7 mil thickness means that your prints have a sturdy, professional feel to them. Each package contains 50 sheets of paper.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Double-Sided Matte Paper is the ideal paper for printing sales brochures, greeting cards, newsletters and photographic portfolios that require both photographic image quality as well as the versatility of two-sided printing with no show-through. Produces bright, vibrant images and crisp dark text. Heavyweight, two-sided, coated paper has a smooth finish and is compatible with all inkjet printers.

See more
feature_bullets: Perfect for non-glare photographs, craft projects and signage.
Guaranteed to work with all inkjet printers.
